== About Me ==
I graduated in 2022 with a B.S. in Computer Engineering from the University of Minnesota - Twin Cities, and joined Canonical in October of 2022 as a member of the Ubuntu Kernel Team. At Canonical my work has been primarily on the Ubuntu Tegra project, but I regularly handle SRU updates for a few other kernels.

== My Ubuntu Story ==
I first discovered Ubuntu through an "Ubuntu Linux for Dummies" book I found in the computing section of my local library. I figured out how to download the latest version (9.04 at the time) and burn a Live CD, which I tried out on an old (and rather slow!) Pentium III machine my parents let me tinker with.

Later in life I used Ubuntu to run game and web servers (thankfully on more modern hardware), and continued to use Ubuntu as a hobby, development, and daily driver OS. Through this I've had experience troubleshooting system configuration issues, deploying Internet-facing services, and developing and debugging software on and for Linux systems.
